reviewText: Absolutely love this movie.  Not here to review the movie, but the Bluray is excellent, the metal case looks elegant and is a nice addition to my collection.  To use an old ebay term...A+

This is my favorite Kubrick movie except for the creepy HALL scenes and chilling piano scenes from Eyes Wide Shut, this is my favorite Kubrick. The Shinning has some great moments too.

What makes this movie for me is Peter Sellers, both as an officer from the British Military and he plays Dr. Strangelove, quite possibly Peter Sellers greatest role ever.
